price: 56. Quant à ceux qui auront mécru, Je leur ferai subir un terrible supplice ici-bas et dans l’au-delà, et ils n’auront point d’alliés.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَأُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدٗا فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna kafarū fa-uʿadhibuhum ʿadhāban shadīdan fī al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
